qas.question: What can the clearance of pathogens be influenced by in an individual?
What is the brand name Pegasys for?
What are patients carrying certain genetic variant alleles near the IL28B gene more likely to achieve?
What can the increase of pathogens be stopped by in an individual?
What are patients carrying certain genetic variant alleles near the IL28B gene always going to achieve?
What disease has no known treatment?
What can only be induced by treatment and not spontaneously?

context: <b6_0>The clearance of the pathogens<b6_0/>, either treatment-induced or spontaneous, it can be influenced by the <a0_0><b3_0>genetic variants<b3_0/><a0_0/> carried by the individual patients. For instance, for genotype 1 <b5_0>hepatitis C<b5_0/> treated with Pegylated interferon-alpha-2a or <a1_0>Pegylated interferon-alpha-2b<a1_0/> (brand names Pegasys or PEG-Intron) combined with ribavirin, it has been shown that genetic polymorphisms near the human IL28B gene, encoding interferon lambda 3, are associated with significant differences in the treatment-induced clearance of the virus. This finding, originally reported in Nature, showed that genotype 1 hepatitis C patients carrying certain genetic variant alleles near the IL28B gene are more possibly to achieve <a2_0><b4_0>sustained virological response<b4_0/><a2_0/> after the treatment than others. Later report from Nature demonstrated that the same genetic variants are also associated with the natural clearance of the genotype 1 hepatitis C virus.
